attributes.additional_details: Because we knows Xl Bully babies is loving and caring and don’t put young babies down!
attributes.background: Peoples struggling to rehome Xl Bully babies they’re can’t rehome them after 31st december they’re need a good home and don’t put babies down they’re need a lovely home!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:
Review and reform arrangements for ban on XL Bully type dogs - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652260
